# Mary Ann Cumming
<img alt="Mary Ann Mackay (née Cumming)" class="profile-pic" src="data:image/jpg;base64,"/>
(26 July, 1900 - 8 October, 1981)

## Names

* Mary Ann Cumming
* Mary Ann Mackay (married name)
* Marion Mackay (variation)
* Mary Anne Cumming (variation)
